response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It's a valuable asset that holds great significance to me, and I believe it can greatly benefit you as well. Given its quality and the effort put into it, I'm offering it to you for $120. This price reflects the value I see in the product and my desire to share it with someone who appreciates it as much as I do. I trust you'll find it worth every penny.
